mapper.sql: id as id ,info_id as info_id ,occupation as occupation ,background_id as background_id ,background as background ,background_score as background_score ,fur_id as fur_id ,fur as fur ,fur_score as fur_score ,clothes_id as clothes_id ,clothes as clothes ,clothes_score as clothes_score ,facial_expression_id as facial_expression_id ,facial_expression as facial_expression ,facial_expression_score as facial_expression_score ,head_expression_id as head_expression_id ,head as head ,head_score as head_score ,create_time as create_time ,update_time as update_time
